system.description: An invisible barrier surrounds you and moves with you. The space within is impervious to most magical effects (spells, spell-like abilities, supernatural abilities) and prevents magic items and spells from functioning inside. The field suppresses but does not dispel; duration continues. Summoned creatures and incorporeal undead wink out in the field and reappear when it ends. Normal creatures and missiles can enter. Golems, constructs, elementals, corporeal undead, and outsiders are unaffected unless summoned; their spell-like/supernatural abilities may be nullified. Wall of force, prismatic spells, artifacts, and deities are unaffected.

components.materialDescription: A pinch of powdered iron or iron filings (arcane); divine focus (divine).
